thread.title: Coronation Street moved and Emmerdale cancelled for 'bumper' Brit Awards on ITV1 tomorrow night
thread.title_full: Coronation Street moved and Emmerdale cancelled for 'bumper' Brit Awards on ITV1 tomorrow night

title: Coronation Street moved and Emmerdale cancelled for 'bumper' Brit Awards on ITV1 tomorrow night
text:
A BRIT UNFAIR Coronation Street moved and Emmerdale cancelled for ‘bumper’ Brit Awards on ITV1 tomorrow night 
The two popular soaps have had to make way for the biggest showbiz event of the year Exclusive By Andy Halls, TV Editor 21st February 2017, 5:00 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments EMMERDALE fans will be gutted to hear that the soap has been cancelled tomorrow night due the Brit Awards. 
And it’s bad news for Coronation Street fans too who will have to watch the show half an hour earlier because the music bash starts at 7pm. 2 Coronation Street will be shown earlier tomorrow night because of the Brit Awards 
It’s not the first time other pesky programmes have got in the way of viewers’ beloved soap. 
In November the double bill of Coronation Street was axed for a night because of I’m A Celebrity…Get Me Out of Here starting earlier . 
Twitter fans were vexed about the scheduling change. 
One fan wrote: “Excuse me why is i’m a celeb on at 8:30 tomorrow, not feeling missing an episode of corrie.” 
And one added: “Oh no! There’s less #Corrie on tonight.” 2 Emmerdale viewers will be gutted to hear the soap has been cancelled tomorrow night 
The Brits takes place tomorrow night at London’s O2 Arena and recognises the very best in music talent. 
Ed Sheeran, Katy Perry, The 1975 and Little Mix are just some of the stars taking to the stage for the show. 
The live programme will be hosted by Dermot O’Leary and Emma Willis after Michael Buble was forced to pull out due to his son’s cancer diagnosis. Little Mix sing their No1 hit Black Magic at the BRITs Related stories BRIT AND MISS Here's 15 of the Brits’ most shocking moments... from Jarvis Cocker flashing to John Prescott getting soaked eyes on the prize The full rundown of BRIT Award 2017 nominees and all you need to know about the night RAISING THE STAKES Who will win at the Brit Awards 2017? Latest odds and winner predictions as the countdown gets underway A BRIT OF PERRY Katy Perry confirmed to perform at this year's BRIT Awards joining all-star line-up HOST WITH THE MOST Who is Emma Willis? Celebrity Big Brother, The Voice and the Brits presenter - here's what we know 
A source said: “It was a difficult call but Michael has decided to pull out of hosting the Brit Awards. 
“Out of respect for Michael the producers gave him as much time as he needed to make the decision, which they completely understood.
